_OpenTelemetrySection: All OTEL_* settings below are REQUIRED for Dynatrace metrics ingestion. Do not remove or modify without testing against Dynatrace. See .github/TELEMETRY_CONFIGURATION_REVIEW.md for details and troubleshooting.
_EndpointNote: Dynatrace OTLP endpoint (v2 API). URL and path vary by Dynatrace region and tenant. Verify with DevOps if metrics aren't appearing.
_ProtocolNote: Binary protobuf format required (not gRPC). Dynatrace OTLP ingest only supports http/protobuf.
_HeadersNote: Dynatrace API token for OTLP ingest. Token must have OTLP ingestion permission. NEVER hardcode in code - use Key Vault in production.
_IgnoreSSLNote: For development/QA with self-signed certificates. MUST be false in production. Only needed if using internal Dynatrace instance.
_ForceHTTP11Note: Dynatrace OTLP endpoint performs better with HTTP/1.1. Leave as true.
_ServiceNameNote: Used by Dynatrace to group and identify this service in dashboards. Format: ProfitSharing-{Environment}. Change for each deployment.
_TemporalityNote: ⚠️ CRITICAL: MUST be 'delta' for Dynatrace (not 'cumulative' which is the OTLP SDK default). Dynatrace doesn't support cumulative temporality. This was discovered after initial deployment - ensure all environments have this setting.
_ResourceAttributesNote: Metadata tags that appear in Dynatrace. Used for filtering, grouping, and correlating metrics. Update version when releasing.
